paradox 0.1
  • Reference

ParamSet

Source: R/ParamSet.R
ParamSet.Rd

A R6Class to represent set of parameters.

ParamSet

Format

R6Class object

Value

[ParamSet].

Member Variables

params

[list]
List of the Params

trafo

[function(x, dict, tags)]
A function that returns a list of transformed x values. Has to work vectorized and also return untransformed x values. The function takes a list x of all parameter values, additionally the dictionary linked to the ParamSet. tags is a named list that contains the tags for each Param in x.

restriction

[quote]
A quoted expression (quote()) that is evaluated on all parameter values to check if they are feasible. It has to be evaluated to TRUE so that the parameter value is valid. The expression has to work on vectors of values.

Methods

generate_lhs_design(n, lhs_function)

[function]
Function to generate a LHS design.

generate_grid_design(resolution, param_resolutions, n)

[function]

resolution

[integer(1)] for each parameter universally

param_resolutions

[integer] for each parameter individually. Has to be a named vector.

n

[integer(1)] size of design. Will be tried to match by optimizing \(r^k * (r-1)^(p-k) - n\). r = resolution, p = total number of parameters.

Active Bindings

ids

[character]
ids of the Parameters in this ParamSet.

storage_types

[character]
How is a Value of this Parameter stored as an R-object?

values

[list]
For any discrete Parameter return the values. Also works for Integers.

lower

[numeric]
For each numeric Parameter return the lower boundary. NA for other Parameters.

upper

[numeric]
Same as for lower

param_classes

[character]
The R6 class name of each Parameter.

range

[data.table]
A data.table with the columns id, lower, upper.

length

[integer(1)]
The number of parameters.

nlevels

[integer]
For each discrete Parameter return the number of different values.

member_tags

[list]
The tags of each Parameter.
